channel.title: ubucon on Marcos Costales

item.title: Ubucon Europe 2019 | Sintra edition
item.description:
¬°Y comienza una nueva Ubucon Europea! En esta ocasi√≥n en Sintra, Portugal.
¬°Bienvenidos! Llegu√© el d√≠a anterior justo a tiempo para una cena de bienvenida organizada en un vivero de empresas extravagante: Chalet 12. All√≠ unas 25 personas compartimos momentos entra√±ables con una cena cocinada por la propia organizaci√≥n.
Marco | Costales | Tiago | Olive Lo cierto es que la organizaci√≥n Ubuntu-PT estuvo realizando actividades y visitas toda la semana para los miembros de la comunidad que iban llegando con antelaci√≥n, todo un detallazo.

item.title: UbuCon Europe 2018: Analysing a dream
item.description: UbuCon Europe 2018: Analysing a dream (English) The idea of organising the Ubucon in Xixon, Asturies was set two years ago, while participating in the European Ubucon in Essen (Germany). The Paris Ubucon took place and in those days we uderstood that there was a group enough of people with the capacities and the will to hold an European Congress for Ubuntu lovers. We had learnt a lot from German and French colleagues thanks to their respective amazing organizations and, at the same time, our handicap was the lack of s consolidated group in Spain.

item.title: UbuCon Europe 2018 | 1 Week to go!!
item.description:
Yes! Everything is ready for the incoming UbuCon Europe 2018 in Xix√≥n! üòÉ We'll have an awesome weekend of conferences (with 4 parallel¬†talks), podcasts, stands, social events… Most of them are in English, but there will be in Spanish & Asturian too.
\o/ The speakers are coming from all these countries:
\o/ Are you ready for an incredible UbuCon? :)
Testing the Main Room #noedits Remember that you have transport discounts and a main social event: the espicha.

item.title: Ubucon Europe 2018: Last call for papers & current status event
item.description:
You're on time for submit a conference, workshop, stand or podcast for the next Ubucon!!
Main room. With no edits ;) Just checking things in situ for April We're working hard for the next Ubucon Europe 2018 and we would like to tell you the current status: Official webpage¬†updated.¬† You have especial discounts for your travel in bus, train and hotel. More info here. The conferences will be for free.

item.title: Ubucon Europe 2018: Call for papers
item.description:
Yes! It's the time for submit a conference, workshop, podcast and/or stand for the next Ubucon Europe 2018 |o/
Spread your knowledge to hundred of people! We would love to hear you! + info.

item.title: 3rd Ubucon Europe 2018
item.description:
Yes! A new edition for ubunteros around the world! :))
Ubucons around the world Is Ubucon made for me? This event is just for you! ;) You don't need to be a developer, because you'll enjoy a lot of talks about everything you can to imagine about Ubuntu and share great moments with other users. Even the language won't be a problem. there, you'll meet people from everywhere and surely someone will speak in your language :)

item.title: Cr√≥nica de la 2¬™ Ubucon Europea
item.description: **6 de Septiembre,¬†**Mi√©rcoles ¬°Por fin! Una nueva Ubucon Europea est√° a la vuelta de la esquina. Tras la primera de Alemania, toca Par√≠s. Llegu√© un par de d√≠as antes, pues era m√°s barato el avi√≥n en estas fechas tan saturadas de turistas. Marius Quabeck, Miguel Men√©ndez y un par de chicos escandinavos (los cuales hicieron una bolera con Arduinos) nos juntamos de manera improvisada para cenar enfrente del museo donde se har√≠a el evento.

item.title: Ubucon Europe 2016 - Day 3
item.description:
Me toc√≥ abrir este¬†√∫ltimo d√≠a¬†de la¬†Ubucon con una charla sobre uNav. Tras el¬†“You have arrived at your presentation” espont√°neo de Nathan, cont√© la historia y algunos trucos de esta aplicaci√≥n tan querida por la comunidad y mostr√© en exclusiva el v√≠deo original del spot.
uNav's talk
Llenazo :)) Apenas pude llegar a la charla de Daniel sobre snaps que coincid√≠a con la m√≠a. El resto del d√≠a lo pas√© compartiendo¬†ratos con distintas personas, m√°s que en las charlas.

item.title: Ubucon Europe 2016 - Day 2
item.description: D√≠a del comienzo de las charlas. La novedad la anunci√≥¬†Marius de UBPorts. Pondr√° a la venta un dock para Ubuntu Phone/Tablet con el que se podr√° enviar la se√±al del m√≥vil a un monitor y tener as√≠ la ansiada convergencia. Costar√° unos 60‚Ç¨ y funcionar√° (a priori) con cualquiera de los m√≥viles actuales con Ubuntu. Tras Marius, abri√≥ Jane Silver el d√≠a,¬†cont√°ndonos ante una atestada sala el ancho ecosistema ubuntero.
